attributes.action: Jeremy Corbyn for Prime Minister. Re-hold the General Election.
attributes.background: Now that David Cameron has stood down from his role as PM, and in light of recent EU events, we feel that the Labour Party have more chance of turning this country around and stopping it becoming even more divided. Jeremy Corbyn cares more about us than most other MP's and would make a great PM

rejection.details:
It is not possible to "re-hold" a General Election.

The following petition calls for a fresh General Election to be held in light of the outcome of the EU referendum:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133548
